title: If you took the total number of tax parcels in the Town of Oak Island (all of them, large, small, commercial, lots, improved, unimproved - you name it) and then took the total amount of debt owed on the new sewer system (all of it) - and then divided the total debt by the total number of parcels - how much would that be per parcel? Just to help Oak Islanders mentally get our arms around the situation a little better - not suggesting we pay it off this way... - Thanks!
